name: Long Mage
description:
Clear the dungeon by using your powers: Make the things larger

How To Play

Hit objects with your Staff and make it larger

Take the potions to change your size

Move with your cursor by clicking or pressing left click (Image)

Get the keys to complete the level

CREDITS

Game made for: TheDinoEmman

For the game Jam “Tu juego a juicio Jam 2021”

With the theme “Demasiado Largo”

Assets (Itch.io)

0x72 BlackSpire Studio

Music (Youtube)

Equinoxx

Patrikus Droilius

LostVGM

¡Thanks For Playing!
